org.fcrepo.connector.fedora3

Class Fedora3FederationConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.federation.spi.Connector
      • org.modeshape.jcr.federation.spi.ReadOnlyConnector
        • org.fcrepo.connector.fedora3.Fedora3FederationConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.jcr.FedoraJcrTypes

    public class Fedora3FederationConnector
extends org.modeshape.jcr.federation.spi.ReadOnlyConnector
implements org.fcrepo.jcr.FedoraJcrTypes
    A ReadOnly connector to a fedora 3 repository.
    Author:
    Michael Durbin

    • Field Detail

      • f3

        protected Fedora3DataInterface f3

      • fedoraUrl

        protected String fedoraUrl
        Set by reflection to the value in the ModeShape repository configuration json file, this is the URL for the fedora repository over which this connector federates.

      • username

        protected String username
        Set by reflection to the value in the ModeShape repository configuration json file, this is the username to access the fedora 3 repository over which this connector federates. This user should have access to all content that is meant to be exposed in the federation.

      • password

        protected String password
        Set by reflection to the value in the ModeShape repository configuration json file, this is the password to access the fedora 3 repository over which this connector federates.

      • organizer

        protected RepositoryOrganizer organizer

      • getDocumentId

        public String getDocumentId(String externalPath)
        Specified by:

      • getIdFromPath

        protected String getIdFromPath(String path)
        The root path is always '/', organizational node paths are made up up any number of organizational node ids concatenated together, while all other nodes are made up of any number of organizational node paths concatenated together followed by an object, datastream or content ID. This method uses that to determine the id of the node at the given path.

      • getDocumentPathsById

        public Collection<String> getDocumentPathsById(String id)
        Specified by:
        getDocumentPathsById in class org.modeshape.jcr.federation.spi.Connector

      • buildPath

        protected String buildPath(String path,
               String currentId)
        The root path is always '/', organizational node paths are made up up any number of organizational node ids concatenated together, while all other nodes are made up of any number of organizational node paths concatenated together followed by an object, datastream or content ID. This method uses that to build a path from an ID.

      • hasDocument

        public boolean hasDocument(String idStr)
        Checks if a document with the given id exists.
        Specified by:
        hasDocument in class org.modeshape.jcr.federation.spi.Connector
        Parameters:
        idStr - a non-null string representing the identifier within the system whose existence is being queried in this federation.
